greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows of 2n+1 terms, where row n+1 is generated by taking partial sums of row n and then append a zero followed by the final term in the partial sums of row n, for n>=0, with T(0,0)=1.
comment: Final term in row n equals A098746(n) = number of permutations of [1..n] which avoid 4231 and 42513.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, May 26 2007
